title: LinkedIn Ads Connection
description: OAuth-based integration with LinkedIn Ads platform for B2B lead generation and advertising

specs.title: Create LinkedIn Ads connection with valid OAuth credentials
specs.given: valid LinkedIn Ads OAuth client ID and secret from LinkedIn Ads developer console
specs.when: user creates a new LinkedIn Ads connection
specs.then: connection is created successfully and OAuth flow can be initiated

specs.title: Reject LinkedIn Ads connection with invalid credentials
specs.when: user attempts to create LinkedIn Ads connection
specs.then: system returns validation error indicating credential issue

specs.title: Update LinkedIn Ads connection name
specs.when: user updates connection name to a valid unique value
